mapper.insert: insert into ft_pmrf( REC_ACCT, TXN_JOUR, TXN_STATUS, TXN_DATE, TXN_CODE, BUSINESS_TYPE, DEDUC_CARD_NO, DEDUC_NAME, DEDUC_BANK_CODE, DEDUC_BANK_NAME, DEDUC_BANK_NUMBER, PAY_PASSWORD, RECV_BANK_CODE, RECV_BANK_NAME, RECV_BANK_NUMBER, RECV_CARD_NO, RECV_NAME, TRANS_AMT, TRANS_CCY, GIRO_WAY, TRANS_TYPE, VOUCHER_KIND, CHARGE_TYPE, SERVICE_CHARGE_FUNC, SERVICE_CHARGE_AMT, RECORD_ID, CHECK_ID, CHECK_RESULT, REJECT_REASON, CHECK_DATE, CHECK_TIME, Remark, ACCUNT_WAY, create_user, create_time, update_user, update_time )values( #{REC_ACCT}, #{TXN_JOUR}, #{TXN_STATUS}, #{TXN_DATE}, #{TXN_CODE}, #{BUSINESS_TYPE}, #{DEDUC_CARD_NO}, #{DEDUC_NAME}, #{DEDUC_BANK_CODE}, #{DEDUC_BANK_NAME}, #{DEDUC_BANK_NUMBER}, #{PAY_PASSWORD}, #{RECV_BANK_CODE}, #{RECV_BANK_NAME}, #{RECV_BANK_NUMBER}, #{RECV_CARD_NO}, #{RECV_NAME}, #{TRANS_AMT}, #{TRANS_CCY}, #{GIRO_WAY}, #{TRANS_TYPE}, #{VOUCHER_KIND}, #{CHARGE_TYPE}, #{SERVICE_CHARGE_FUNC}, #{SERVICE_CHARGE_AMT}, #{RECORD_ID}, #{CHECK_ID}, #{CHECK_RESULT}, #{REJECT_REASON}, #{CHECK_DATE}, #{CHECK_TIME}, #{Remark}, #{ACCUNT_WAY}, #{create_user}, #{create_time}, #{update_user}, #{update_time} )
